title: Last one left! High Quality 2 Bedroom Condo for rent --- He/hw --- 9/1
posting_body: Wonderful 2 Bedroom on Englewood Ave in Cleveland Circle
Newly renovated kitchen with granite countertops, new cabinets, new Bosch dishwasher and much more
Second floor unit with elevator in building
Amazing location - very close to Green Line C, D & B
Very Rare Listing, will not find anything similar in Cleveland Circle
For showings, email patrick @ <URL> (no spaces) or text your email address to 508.243.5319
Also, video available, reach out if you would like to see it - also available for in person tours
Also, feel free to check out my Youtube Channel for full video walkthroughs of several apartments in Boston, Brighton, Brookline and more.
